entry.title: Sanctuary4All is selling burritos this weekend! You can order at...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Sanctuary4All is selling burritos this weekend! You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co Rather than going toward a particular family, the money from burrito sales will go toward an emergency fund that any family can access in a time of need. While the Biden administration has halted deportations for the first 100 days of their administration, ICE can still detain people, and this emergency fund is essential in ensuring that if someone is detained, there’s money ...readily available to get them legal representation. The photo is from our recent car rally co-hosted with @co_immigrant @abolishicedenver the American Friends Service Committee & Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition demanding that the Biden administration take further action to keep families together and provide a pathway to permanent legal status for all 11 million undocumented people living in the U.S.

See More

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All ColoradoIt’s our last sale of the month! Two families will be working together to make burritos, and...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

It’s our last sale of the month! Two families will be working together to make burritos, and the money will go toward an emergency fund, rather than the familie...s cooking. The growth of this fund is incredibly important to the families who lead Sanctuary4All because it provides security in case anyone is unexpectedly detained and needs money quickly for legal representation. You can order a burrito at solidaritymeals.paperform.co

See More

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.Yessenia and her husband Carlos have been advocating for immigrant...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Yessenia and her husband Carlos have been advocating for immigrant rights in Denver for years and bravely sharing their family’s story. This weekend they’re sel...ling pupusas, which are incredibly popular in El Salvador, Carlos’ home country, and in Salvadoran & Honduran communities across the U.S. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: Jeanette Vizguerra Ingrid Ivett Encalada
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Jeanette Vizguerra Ingrid Ivett Encalada

President Biden wants Congress to send him a bill with a path to citizenship for people here illegally, though that may not apply to people in sanctuary in Colorado.

9news.com

Biden's proposed changes to immigration policy may not change much for people in sanctuary

President Biden wants Congress to send him a bill with a path to citizenship for people here illegally, though that may not apply to people in sanctuary in Colorado.President Biden wants Congress to send him a bill with a path to citizenship for people here illegally, though that may not apply to people in sanctuary in Colorado.
